resources.string: Before using this app, make sure to set your VoIP.ms portal email address and API password in Settings.\n\nAfter setting your email and password, you will also need to pick an SMS-enabled DID by tapping the Select DID option in the menu associated with this screen.
Delete local copy of SMS database
